name: Dungeons and Dating
description:
Uh oh... CHRISTOPH the BARD once again has gotten himself separated from his adventuring party.

Artwork: Christoph Schoch and David Yu

Writing and Story: Billy Tremaine

Programming: Andrew Oatley-Willis

Sound and Music: Kai Winters

Note:

Window version should be run in 1920x1080 fullscreen

Linux version works in windowed mode at 1920x1080... Not very well

Mac version has not been tested... Good luck...
